no_app_to_handle_data.message: Can\'t find an app to handle this type of data.

ask_leave_group.message: Are you sure you want to leave this group?

ask_export_attachment.message: Export attachment? Exporting attachments will allow any other apps on your device to access them.\n\nContinue?

ask_block_contact.message: Block this contact? You will no longer receive messages from this contact.

ask_unblock_contact.message: Unblock this contact? You will once again be able to receive messages from this contact.

ask_delete_contacts.message: Delete contacts? This will permanently delete the selected contacts.\n\nContacts with ongoing chats and contacts from the system\'s address book cannot be deleted permanently.

chat_no_messages_hint.message:
Send message to %1$s:

• It is okay if %2$s does not use Delta Chat.

• Delivering the first message may take a while and may be unencrypted.

chat_new_group_hint.message:
Compose the first message, allowing others to reply within this group.

• It is okay if not all members use Delta Chat.

• Delivering the first message may take a while.

chat_record_explain.message: Tap and hold to record a voice message, release to send

chat_no_chats_yet_hint.message: Give your inbox something to write home about. Get started by messaging a friend.

chat_all_done_explain.message: Zip. Zilch. Zero. Nada.\nYou\'re all caught up!

search_explain.message: Search for chats, contacts, and messages

group_please_enter_group_name.message: Please enter a name for the group.

group_hello_draft.message: Hello, I\'ve just created the group \"%1$s\" for us.

group_self_not_in_group.message: You must be a member of the group to perform this action.

invite_slogan.message: Friends don\'t let friends locked in messaging silos.

invite_default_text.message: Let\'s switch to Delta Chat - %1$s - you can text me at %2$s

welcome_intro1_message.message: The messenger with the broadest audience in the world. Free and independent.

welcome_intro2_message.message: There is no Delta Chat server. The app only uses your mail server.

welcome_intro4_message.message: Unlimited chats, images, videos, audio messages and more. Multi-client capable.

welcome_intro5_message.message: Delta Chat is free forever. Open-source. No ads. No subscription. No vendor lock-in.

welcome_intro6_message.message: Encrypted with all common algorithms. Messages stay on your servers.

welcome_intro7_message.message: Delta Chat is safe for business use, compatible and standards-based.

login_subheader.message: For known email providers additional settings are setup automatically. Sometimes IMAP needs to be enabled in the web frontend. Consult your email provider or friends for help.

login_info_gmail_text.message: For GMail Accounts you need to create an App-Password if you have 2FA enabled. If this setting is not available, you need to enable Less Secure Apps.

login_error_mail.message: Please enter a valid email address

login_error_server.message: Please enter a valid server / IP address

login_error_required_fields.message: Please enter a valid email address and a password

import_backup_ask.message: Backup found at \"%1$s\".\n\nDo you want to import and use all data and settings from it?

import_backup_no_backup_found.message: No backups found.\n\nCopy the backup to \"%1$s\" and try again. Alternatively, press \"Start messaging\" to go with the normal setup process.

login_error_cannot_login.message: Cannot login as \"%1$s\". Please check if the email-address and the password are correct.

login_error_server_response.message: Response from %1$s: %2$s\n\nSome providers place additional information in your inbox; you can check them it eg. in the web frontend. Consult your provider or friends if you run into problems.

pref_trim_option_explain.message: Automatically delete older messages once a chat exceeds a specified length

pref_trim_now_ask.message: Delete all old messages now? This will immediately trim all chats to the %d most recent messages.

pref_who_can_see_profile_explain.message: Your profile picture and name will be shown alongside your messages when communicating with other users. Already sent information can not be deleted or removed.

pref_default_status_text.message: Sent with my Delta Chat Messenger: https://delta.chat

pref_enter_sends_explain.message: Pressing the Enter key will send text messages

pref_change_secret_explain.message: Change your pin / pattern / fingerprint via system settings

pref_screen_security_explain.message: Block screenshots in the recents list and inside the app

pref_screen_security_please_restart_hint.message: To apply the screen security setting please restart the app.

pref_incognito_keyboard_explain.message: Request keyboard to disable personalized learning

pref_read_receipts_explain.message: If read receipts are disabled, you won\'t be able to see read receipts from others.

pref_use_system_emoji_explain.message: Disable Delta Chat\'s built-in emoji support

pref_backup_export_explain.message: A backup helps you to set up a new installation on this or on another device.\n\nThe backup will contain all messages, contacts and chats and your end-to-end Autocrypt setup. Keep the backup file in a safe place or delete it as soon as possible.

pref_managekeys_ask_for_storage_permissi.message: Delta Chat needs access to your files to import/export keys.

pref_managekeys_import_explain.message:
Import secret keys from "%1$s"?

• Existing secret keys will not be deleted

• The last imported key will be used as the new default key unless it has the word "legacy" in its filename

autocrypt_explain.message: Autocrypt is a new and open specification for automatic end-to-end email encryption.\n\nYour end-to-end setup is created automatically as needed and you can transfer it between devices with Autocrypt Setup Messages.

autocrypt_send_asm_explain_before.message: An \"Autocrypt Setup Message\" securely shares your end-to-end setup with other Autocrypt-compliant apps.\n\nThe setup will be encrypted by a setup code which is displayed here and must be typed on the other device.

autocrypt_send_asm_explain_after.message:
Your setup has been sent to yourself. Switch to the other device and open the setup message. You should be prompted for a setup code. Type the following digits into the prompt:

%1$s

Once you're done, your other device will be ready to use Autocrypt.

autocrypt_asm_general_body.message: This is the Autocrypt Setup Message used to transfer your end-to-end setup between clients.\n\nTo decrypt and use your setup, open the message in an Autocrypt-compliant client and enter the setup code presented on the generating device.

autocrypt_asm_click_body.message: This is the Autocrypt Setup Message used to transfer your end-to-end setup between clients.\n\nTo decrypt and use your setup, tap or click on this message.

autocrypt_continue_transfer_please_enter.message: Please enter the setup code that is displayed on the other device.

autocrypt_continue_transfer_succeeded.message: End-to-end setup transferred. This device is now ready to use Autocrypt with the same setup as the other device.

autocrypt_bad_setup_code.message: Bad setup code. Please try again.\n\nIf you do not remember the setup code, just send another Autocrypt Setup Message from the other device.

systemmsg_read_receipt_body.message: This is a read receipt for the message \"%1$s\".\n\nIt means that message was displayed on the recipient\'s device, not necessarily that the content was read.

systemmsg_cannot_decrypt.message:
This message cannot be decrypted.

• It might already help to simply reply to this message and ask the sender to send the message again.

• In case you re-installed Delta Chat or another email program on this or another device you may want to send an Autocrypt Setup Message from there.

screenlock_explain.message: Lock Delta Chat access with Android screen lock or fingerprint

screenlock_unlock_description.message: Please enter your system defined secret to unlock Delta Chat.

screenlock_inactivity_timeout_explain.message: Auto-lock Delta Chat after a specified time interval of inactivity

qrscan_hint.message: Place your camera over the QR code

qrscan_ask_join_verified_group.message: Do you want to join the verified group \"%1$s\"?

qrscan_ask_fingerprint_ask_oob.message: Verify contact and start chatting with \"%1$s\"?

qrscan_fingerprint_mismatch.message: The scanned fingerprint does \"not match\" the fingerprint last seen for \"%1$s\".

qrscan_no_addr_found.message: This QR code contains a fingerprint but no email address.\n\nFor an out-of-band-verification, please establish an encrpyted connection to the recipient first.

qrshow_join_verified_group_hint.message: Scan this to join the verified group \"%1$s\".

qrshow_join_contact_hint.message: \"%1$s\" Scan this to set up a verified contact.

perm_explain_need_for_camera_access.message: To capture photos and video, allow Delta Chat access to the camera.

perm_explain_need_for_mic_access.message: To send audio messages, allow Delta Chat access to your microphone.

perm_explain_need_for_storage_access.message: Delta Chat needs access to your files in order to export files or to create backups.

perm_explain_access_to_camera_denied.message: Delta Chat requires the Camera permission in order to take photos or videos, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to the app settings menu, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Camera\".

perm_explain_access_to_mic_denied.message: Delta Chat requires the Microphone permission in order to send audio messages, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Microphone\".

perm_explain_access_to_storage_denied.message: Delta Chat requires the Storage permission in order to attach or export photos, videos, or audio, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to the app settings menu, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Storage\".

perm_explain_access_to_location_denied.message: Delta Chat requires Location permission in order to attach a location, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to the app settings menu, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Location\".

ask_delete_chat.one: Delete this chat? It will no longer be shown in the chat list, its messages will remain on the server.
ask_delete_chat.other: Delete %d chats? They will no longer be shown in the chat list, their messages will remain on the server.

ask_delete_messages.one: Delete the message here and on the server?
ask_delete_messages.other: Delete %1$d messages here and on the server?

global_menu_preferences_language_desktop.description: Choose language label in the menu

global_menu_view_floatontop_desktop.description: Float on Top menu item label

global_menu_help_learn_desktop.description: Learn more about DeltaChat menu item label

global_menu_help_contribute_desktop.description: Contribute on GitHub menu item label

global_menu_help_report_desktop.description: Report an Issue... menu item label
